Articles.Content:
Sorry, double posted...please delete

Since updating to 21.1 I've noticed that the sound of my engines firing was no longer audible when on the map screen, however, while playing this morning, I did hear it while on the map, and later it was gone...

Am I going crazy? Anyone else experience this?

Edited August 5, 2013 by B K

Yeah, i've noticed the same.

I seem to hear some clunks and bangs occasionally, but not the sounds of my engines running. I have to keep going back to the main view to make sure they are actually firing
